commit.message:
Rollup merge of #32558 - sanxiyn:rustdoc-self-link, r=steveklabnik

Avoid linking to itself in implementors section of trait page

Fix #32474.

files.patch:

+// @!has trait_self_link/trait.Foo.html //a/@href ../trait_self_link/trait.Foo.html
+pub trait Foo {}
+
+pub struct Bar;
+
+impl Foo for Bar {}
